name: Border Coin
loreDescription: "Heads, I'll pretend I didn't see anything and let you go free. But tails...".
Countless people have had their fortunes rely on this old gold coin.

skillDescription.base: Increases Attack by 7.5% when using a non-attack skill. Effect can only stack up to 3 times.
skillDescription.max: Increases Attack by 15.0% when using a non-attack skill. Effect can only stack up to 3 times.
